descriptions: ['DescriptionLa Palma properties is pleased to offer this beautiful high floor three bed with study for sale at a must see price. This unit features 2,280 Sq. Ft. of living space. From the entrance hall, there is a light and spacious living/dining room, guest bathroom and a closed kitchen that has been slight opened up in order to offer more natural light while cooking. the whole apartment offers floor to ceiling windows with partial marina view from the living room / balcony and community view from the guest bedrooms. The kitchen is fully equipped with white kitchen appliances. All three bedrooms are of good size that fits king size beds and they all have large fitted wardrobes with shelves, hanging space and drawers. The unit comes with a Opus built in sound system and speakers in all rooms that can be controlled independently. It is currently tenanted until May 2019 for AED 220,000 / Year.\xa0For more information or in order to schedule a viewings, contact Marcus on +971506995069.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionWe are pleased to represent this fully furnished 4 Bedrooms penthouse with open sea and Palm views and magnificent architecture in the most sought-after locations in Dubai Marina.
Located above the 85th floor, the sprawling 3,179.28 sq.ft Build up area . From the entrance hall entering directly to the very spacious living room complete with elegant white interior, all aspects of the property combine to create an ambiance of contemporary royalty. The property includes four bedrooms and a maid room.
From the living room, kitchen and each bedroom there is a balcony offering a stunning view of the sea, Palm Jumeirah and Burj Al Arab. The bedrooms are a good size with built-in double wardrobes.
The apartment is fully furnished ready to move in.
The facilities in the Princess tower are fantastic offering access to an outdoor pool area and a spacious gym area. There is also a kid's play area, game room in the building and a meeting room. The Princess tower is a short walk to the beach and metro station, Carrefour supermarket and within a 5 min walk to the beach. An ideal unit for end users and investors.
Princess tower is the tallest residential tower in the world, and is situated close to local amenities and easily accessible to Sheik Zayed Road.
Contact Gulf Sothebys International Realty today for a private viewing of this extraordinary property."]

title_advert: ['Full Marina View 04 Unit Apartment in Cayan tower']
amenities:
['Unfurnished
Balcony
Built in Wardrobes
Covered Parking
Kitchen Appliances
Security
Shared Gym
Shared Spa
View of Water']
descriptions:
['DescriptionLuxhabitat is proud to represent this beautiful 1BR apartment on a high floor in Dubai Marina's Landmark tower, "Cayan Tower".
The 04 Units have by far the highest demand, as the view is completely unobstructed towards the Dubai Marina and your sight is not interrupted by upcoming developments around Cayan Tower. This unit comes unfurnished with a very unique layout.
Once you enter the apartment a big living area with the open kitchen, a small breakfast bar and a chilled lounge-style sitting area will welcome you. The big bedroom has an en-suite bathroom and is adjacent to the living room. Cayan Tower has only two types of 1 bedroom apartment and this is the highest demanded layout in the whole tower. Views and quality of the property are stunning. Perfect for an end-user or investor, as the returns for such units are quite high (expected rent is 120,000 AED) 
Cayan Tower, the 72-storey residential tower is the landmark in the marina and one of the most photographed towers after the famous Burj Khalifa. It spirals in a smooth curve by an astonishing 90 degrees to give every apartment a stunning view of the sea or the marina. Cayan Tower's dynamic twisting shape challenges conventional architecture and redefines standards of luxury.
The tower is situated in a key location at the mouth of Dubai Marina thus enjoying great views on to the marina, sea and The Palm.
Cayan Tower is a truly architectural vision, certain to take its place as an icon not only in Dubai but in the world through winning the international property award more than once. Designed by world-renowned Skidmore Owings and Merrill, otherwise known for projects such as Burj Khalifa, Sears Tower in Chicago, Jin Mao in Shanghai among many others.
The development offers you a 5-Star-hotel lifestyle with concierge service, a big pool, a SPA, a BBQ area, and a half-floor gym.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionIf you have always dreamed of living right on one of the best beaches in the world, reality can trump your dream at Jumeirah Beach Residence. Beachfront cafes, world-class hotels, delightful shopping experience, excellent walking environment are here to entertain you.\nThis community is vibrant and dynamic both night and day, thanks to its key feature, a beautiful stretch of beach, that runs parallel to the community and includes parking, retail, and food options; in addition, The Walk at JBR is a series of restaurants, cafes, retail shops, beauty salons, and other convenience outlets built on the ground floor level of the residential towers\nThe swimming pools and gym are on the plaza level access, with the security entrance and access to retails shops, restaurants, and supermarkets, others']
